title: DNN Skin from Angular/CSS/HTML Theme
snippet:
We are required to create a DNN skin from an Angular/CSS/HTML theme. The skin you create has to fulfill these requirements:
1. Responsive
2. Contain containers - you must analyze the current design and extract containers that will enable us to recreate the pages and their elements on DNN skin. 
3. Pages - you will have to analyze the skin and extract the pages and the layouts that are required for the job. 
4. Angular/Bootstrap 3 - when possible make use of Angular and bootstrap for better user experience and animation 
5. Responsive - the skin must be responsive according to given break points
